sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"热心的，热诚的"之意。
means: enthusiastic ： 指对参与某项活动或对感兴趣的计划或决定表现出的毫无保留的热切心情。
intent ： 指集中精力从事正在进行的活动，也可指专心寻求自己感兴趣的东西。
zealous ： 指对所从事的事表现出的高度热情和积极性。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"意图，企图"之意。
means: intention ： 普通用词，指某人内心产生的想做某事的想法，侧重内心活动。
intent ： 法律用词，常指某人怀有歹意而犯罪。
design ： 多用复数形式，含贬义多指行为不轨的意图。

sentence.Network_en: A peaceful demonstration had been hijacked by anarchists intent on causing trouble.
sentence.Network_cn: 和平示威已遭到蓄意制造事端的无政府主义者的操控。

sentence.Network_en: Booth was a revivalist intent on his Christian vocation.
sentence.Network_cn: 布思是一个坚定不移地奉行其基督徒天职的宗教复兴运动者。

sentence.Network_en: The rebels are obviously intent on keeping up the pressure.
sentence.Network_cn: 叛乱分子显然决心继续施压。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新东方六级高频词汇整理_百度文库 ... inspirational a. 灵感的 intent a. 专心的，专注的 intricate a. 复杂精细的.
六级单词表精华版 - 豆丁网 ... intensify/ vt.vi. 加强，强化 intent/ a. 目不转睛的，热切的 interact/ vi. 相互作用.
新东方六级高频词汇整理_百度文库 ... inspirational a. 灵感的 intent a. 专心的，专注的 intricate a. 复杂精细的.
intent 意义intent 意义, 含义intentionally

list.abs: ...“Skopos“。除了Skopos，还使用了相关的“目标(aim)“、“目的(purpose)“、“意图(intention)“和“功能(function)“等词。为了避免概念混淆，提议对意图和功能作基本的区分：“意图“是从发.
法律词汇_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... 意图 intention 意向 intention 溢价 premium.
SAT词汇_百度文库 ... instinctive adj. 直觉的 intentional adj. 故意的 logical adj. 逻辑的.
心理学专业词汇翻译辞典 - MBA智库文档 ... intention tremor 意向性震颤 intentional 有意识的 intentional accident 意向性事故.

lj.lj_ly: a man who was to all intents and purposes illiterate.

jx.jx_en_mean: (Law)with the intention of committing a crime

lj.lj_ly: he denied arson with intent to endanger life.
lj.lj_ls: 他否认纵火有杀人企图。

jx.jx_cn_mean: 几乎在一切方面；实际上

lj.lj_ly: To all intents and purposes the case is closed.
lj.lj_ls: 实际上这个案子已了结了

phrase.cizu_name: for all intents and purposes 或 to all intents and purposes

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French entent, entente, based on Latin intendere (see intend). The adjective is from Latin intentus, past participle of intendere

entry.def: If you are intent on doing something, you are eager and determined to do it.

example.ex: The rebels are obviously intent on keeping up the pressure...
example.tran: 叛乱分子显然决心继续施压。

example.ex: The play starred a well-known retired actress who was intent on a come-back.
example.tran: 该剧由一名志在复出的著名隐退女演员主演。

entry.def: If someone does something in an intent way, they pay great attention to what they are doing.

example.ex: She looked from one intent face to another...
example.tran: 她看着一张张专注的面孔。

example.ex: Rodney had been intent on every word.

entry.def: A person's intent is their intention to do something.

example.ex: ...a strong statement of intent on arms control...
example.tran: 决心实施军备控制的有力声明

example.ex: Two men will appear before Birmingham magistrates' court today charged with possession of arms with intent to endanger life.
example.tran: 两名男子今天将在伯明翰地方法庭受审,他们被控持有武器，企图危害他人生命。

entry.tran: 差不多等于;几乎在一切方面
entry.def: You say to all intents and purposes to suggest that a situation is not exactly as you describe it but the effect is the same as if it were.

example.ex: To all intents and purposes he was my father.
example.tran: 他几乎可以称得上是我的父亲。

means.word_mean: 1. an anticipated outcome that is intended or that guides your planned actions;

sentences.sentence: "his intent was to provide a new translation"
"it was created with the conscious aim of answering immediate needs"
"he made no secret of his designs"

means.word_mean: 2. the intended meaning of a communication

sentences.sentence: "so intent on this fantastic...narrative that she hardly stirred"- Walter de la Mare

auth_sentence.content: It was inconsistent with our intent and our policy.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was inconsistent with our intent and our policy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was inconsistent with our intent and our policy.

auth_sentence.content: My intent was not to compare him to Jesus.
auth_sentence.res_content: My intent was not to compare him to Jesus.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: My intent was not to compare him to Jesus.

auth_sentence.content: They have also worked under the name Groovy Intent.
auth_sentence.res_content: They have also worked under the name Groovy Intent.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They have also worked under the name Groovy Intent.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有意的, 故意的, 已经订婚的
stems_affixes.word_buile: intend[v.想要,打算,企图]+ed……的→adj.有意的, 故意的, 已经订婚的 n.已经订婚者
intend[[v.想要,打算,企图]]拿省鷄dj.目不转睛的,热切的 n.意图

stems_affixes.value_cn: 嫩的, 温柔的, 软弱的
stems_affixes.word_buile: tend伸展,趋向+er→像伸出的幼芽→嫩的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 出席, 出席的人数, 伺候, 照料
stems_affixes.word_buile: attend[v.出席,参加]+ance表名词→n.出席, 出席的人数, 伺候, 照料
attend[v.出席,参加]+ant人→n.服务员;随从,随员
intend[v.想要,打算,企图]+ed……的→adj.有意的, 故意的, 已经订婚的 n.已经订婚者
intend[[v.想要,打算,企图]]拿省鷄dj.目不转睛的,热切的 n.意图
tend趋向+ency表名词→n.趋势,趋向;倾向
at加强+tend伸展,趋向→伸出去→出席
con一起+tend伸展,趋向→一起伸展→竞争,斗争

stems_affixes.value_cn: 延长,延伸;扩充;给予;提供;估价
stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出+tend伸展,趋向→伸出去→扩张
in内+tend伸展,趋向→内心伸出→想要

stems_affixes.value_cn: 假装,假托,借口,[在演戏中]装扮
stems_affixes.word_buile: pre预先,提前+tend伸展,趋向→提前展开,事先展开→假装,借口
pro前+tend伸展,趋向→v.[使]伸出, [使]伸展

stems_affixes.value_cn: 趋向,往往是;易于,往往会;照料,看护
stems_affixes.word_buile: tend伸展,趋向→趋向做→易于,往往会

Sentence.sentence: As a result, violations of the law and abuses of the intent of the law have lessened the financial rewards of authors, artists and producers.

means.word_mean: 意图, 意向, 目的

sentences.en: She behaved foolishly but with good intent.
sentences.cn: 她表现得很愚蠢, 不过用心却是好的。

sentences.en: There was an intent look on her face as she watched the game.
sentences.cn: 她看比赛时脸上显示出专注的神色。

sentences.en: He was intent on the job he was doing.
sentences.cn: 他专心致志于正在做的工作。

means.word_mean: 意愿坚决的, 一心想…的

sentences.en: A merchant is intent on making money.

jushi.english: She behaved foolishly but with good intent.
jushi.chinese: 她表现得很愚蠢,不过用心却是好的。

jushi.english: He came with intent to defraud.
jushi.chinese: 他怀着诈取钱财的目的而来。

jushi.english: There was an intent look on her face as she watched the game.
jushi.chinese: 她看比赛时脸上显示出专注的神色。
